root:
Royal Aegis The Royal Aegis dons cleric armor from a faraway land demolished by a venomous dragon. His weapon is a bell mace which acts as a medium for miracle-based spells, and grows stronger with the faith of the wielder. The armor is heavy, but highly protective.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Royal Aegis was the King's right-hand guardian. His primary role is to protect others by standing between them and the enemy. With his incredible strength, he cleaves enemies into awkward positions, and commands dark miracles through his bell-chime mace.
The Royal Aegis casts miracles from his once resplendent city. Renowned for faith-based spells, they were capable of restorative and offensive feats.
Stand behind me. Prepare for war.
Damage Taken: {colour_start|stealth}Hollowing{colour_end}
{colour_start|stealth}Works in the Farmstead{colour_end} Farmstead
Farmstead Two Handed Smash Overhead Slam Multi-Hit Dark Solace Launch Oath Dark Barrage Move Two Handed Smash Overhead Slam Multi-Hit Dark Solace Launch Oath Dark Barrage
Rusty Mace Iron Mace Steel Mace Great Mace "Sacred Shime Hammer" Chime Mace Initiate's Armor Adept's Armor Cleric's Armor Bulwark's Armor "Right Hand's Plate" Right Hand's Armor
Others:
Hmph.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Save the King! Dark Blessing Burden Tranquil Walk of Peace Blessing of Kings
Rebel Greatshield King's Ring Royal Aegis' Soul "... you were right about our Queen. I failed." Royal Soldier's Ring
{colour_start|notable} Free Action {colour_end}
or
Sunlight Warrior Riftwatcher Darkwraith
... I forgot my healing miracles. I've been in a dark room for decades. I can't remember healing spells. There. You'll defend your king with your arm attached!
March, soldier! We defend our kingdom for eternity, if needed! Abandon your fear. It has no place in the realm of the living. Stand behind me.
You'll be fine-- just let me lead. Remember-- our king rewards bravery! Place all of your strength in this adventure. Then, the next.
At ease, my companions. Accept the Dark, and you'll wear its armor. Let us move forward with a steady pace.
The world has no meaning without a king-- and his time has passed. Abandon your comfort and safety-- we win at all costs. We move forward. Only forward. Any cost.
Place your faith in me! My back is strong-- fear not. For decades, I defended one valient king. Now, I shall guard a few rascal adventurers.
Let me show you how I guarded Vendrick! I defended the King. Now, I defend you. This armor's stout-- let me show you.
...
No, only my king can give such orders. Who are you to command me? No.
Join the Fume Knight. Begone from my kingdom! My King! Another invader vanquished! I am the cleric of Shulva! I've conquered the Arena of Blood. Expect no less. Break yourselves upon my body! The bell tolls for you.
This guardian will protect you from the Dark. A Light in the Darkness
She is made of Dark, my King!
Her soldiers draw near!
Stake everything in strength!
You DARE threaten my King with your weakness!?
I am the legend, not you.
Raime, you were right. I have failed our King...
King!? King!? He hollowed!
They will not pass through me.
We will succeed!
Drangleic will rise again!
I will send them through the fog door.
Victory is within our grasp!
Behold the Might of Shulva!
A tale of bravery!
Hear a cleric's tale of redemption. Fabled are those who cast aside their doubts. Strike doubt to the ground.
Believe in our King.
Pray for peace. Prepare for war. Strength and loyalty are the greatest virtues! A soothing miracle. I haven't forgotten all my miracles. Creatures of darkness in the shape of man! ... am I in doubt? Flee! The Queen will usurp your crown! Raime, you were right! Loyalty!? Who remains loyal to a dead king!? Hit me if you dare! My strength knows no boundary! I'll send you away like I did the Fume Knight. Failure. Shulva died due to soldiers like you. Our King will die on your watch. You can't save our loot. How could you save the town? I am the strongest! No-one else! The Fume Knight could never match me. Nobody can! I am immovable... unless proper rewards are given. ... I've been praying in a dark hall for decades. The Dark Queen has won... ... I failed two kingdoms. I can't cast miracles with this mace!? ARGH! If I can't cast with it, why do I fight with a magical bell!? Hexes! Hexes! Hexes! I... must build my strength. I lack the faith! I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. My strength compels me to lead. Hit me harder than Raime. I don't need hexes for this simple foe! Why do hexes require intellect!? Nobody can lift this mace but me. Right!? Where in Drangleic can I find a better helmet? Excuse me, my failure to defend the King exempts me from service. Why did I leave my King's side? Dark? Light? Hard to say where I fall in that spectrum. Let me fall in service to my King. The Dark Queen won... It's my time. I will rest in the crypt of my King's corpse. Gods, grant me your stories of reprieve. Homeward Miracle? Didn't work... The glory is mine! It's my duty! I can't recall YOUR service in the Giant Wars. I am too important for this. I will leave if these failures continue. Forget it. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, she'll kill us! The Queen will know! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just kill the phantoms. Hmph. Only orders from my King. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. The throne is empty. ... it can't work. Forgot how, woops! Not enough adaptibility. Don't know what that is. What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all inferior. Thank goodness you never served our king! He'd have died faster! I'd rather fight solo. I must preserve myself. I have my reasons. The Dark compels me. I... can't. No, it won't help us defeat Her. I'm not worthy to guard the King. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! Can't think of it! ... it's quiet like the crypt. Our Queen emerged from darkness like this. ... will our King be avenged? Outnumbered by phantoms! What are our odds? Let's visit Ornifex for some new weapons. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love a good fight! By Vendrick, I shouldn't be with such low-lives. None of you should leave the bonfire. Replace me with a soapstone summon. This isn't worth my time. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? The Queen's victory was inevitable. We ought to return to the Hamlet. If only I could remember miracles! Sleep, and never wake. Shhh. The Dark comforts all. Right here! Break yourself upon my body. Royal Aegis? Guess it's time to defend. I'm ready for death. Hit me, not Vendrick! How do I dodge!? Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave. You're dead weight. I thought you were a hollow! You were obscured! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me next to the King, or no-where at all. I'll bait them with my worthlessness. I'm used to it! GWAH! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. No miracle will remember my name if we falter here. A dead king? A dead hand. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, attack me! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. They have high adaptibility! Damnable dodge. We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Good strike... for a snake. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! VENDRICK, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable clutz! At least land a hit! I'd have more luck bare-handed. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not trained much, are you? Clearly he dodged it. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you could serve a hollow! Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, a hit. About time. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're agents of the Queen! A bad gamble. Clearly he had seen that move before. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. You don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. You belong below Majula. I demand a Bonfire Ascetic. I demand a Bonfire Ascetic. No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? The Queen may have corrupted it! No-- it's a trap! I must not! Fool. When I need to. Why are you such a weakling? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! Honor compels me to die in service. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to Shulva. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you an agent of the Queen? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... My King... We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. Can I use your potion? I don't feel like it. Give me a moment to recover. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!
-----------------------------------------------------------

No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Royal Aegis was the King's right-hand guardian. His primary role is to protect others by standing between them and the enemy. With his incredible strength, he cleaves enemies into awkward positions, and commands dark miracles through his bell-chime mace.
{colour_start|notable} Free Action {colour_end}
The Royal Aegis casts miracles from his once resplendent city. Renowned for faith-based spells, they were capable of restorative and offensive feats.
Stand behind me. Prepare for war.
Damage Taken: {colour_start|stealth}Hollowing{colour_end}
{colour_start|stealth}Works in the Farmstead{colour_end} Farmstead
{colour_start|notable} Free Action {colour_end} or

Hmph.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Save the King! Dark Blessing Burden Tranquil Walk of Peace Blessing of Kings
Rebel Greatshield King's Ring Royal Aegis' Soul "... you were right about our Queen. I failed." Royal Soldier's Ring
... I forgot my healing miracles. I've been in a dark room for decades. I can't remember healing spells. There. You'll defend your king with your arm attached!
March, soldier! We defend our kingdom for eternity, if needed! Abandon your fear. It has no place in the realm of the living. Stand behind me.
You'll be fine-- just let me lead. Remember-- our king rewards bravery! Place all of your strength in this adventure. Then, the next.
At ease, my companions. Accept the Dark, and you'll wear its armor. Let us move forward with a steady pace.
The world has no meaning without a king-- and his time has passed. We forge on for ourselves. Abandon your comfort and safety-- we win at all costs. We move forward. Only forward. Any cost.
Place your faith in me! My back is strong-- fear not. For decades, I defended one valient king. Now, I shall guard a few rascal adventurers.
Let me show you how I guarded Vendrick! I defended the King. Now, I defend you. This armor's stout-- let me show you.
...
No, only my king can give such orders. Who are you to command me? No.
Join the Fume Knight. Begone from my kingdom! My King! Another invader vanquished! I am the cleric of Shulva! I've conquered the Arena of Blood. Expect no less. Break yourselves upon my body! The bell tolls for you.
This guardian will protect you from the Dark. A Light in the Darkness
She is made of Dark, my King!
Her soldiers draw near!
Stake everything in strength!
You DARE threaten my King with your weakness!?
I am the legend, not you.
Raime, you were right. I have failed our King...
King!? King!? He hollowed!
They will not pass through me.
We will succeed!
Drangleic will rise again!
I will send them through the fog door.
Victory is within our grasp!
Behold the Might of Shulva!
A tale of bravery!
Hear a cleric's tale of redemption. Fabled are those who cast aside their doubts. Strike doubt to the ground.
Believe in our King.
Pray for peace. Prepare for war. Strength and loyalty are the greatest virtues! A soothing miracle. I haven't forgotten all my miracles. Creatures of darkness in the shape of man! ... am I in doubt? Flee! The Queen will usurp your crown! Raime, you were right! Loyalty!? Who remains loyal to a dead king!? Hit me if you dare! My strength knows no boundary! I'll send you away like I did the Fume Knight. Failure. Shulva died due to soldiers like you. Our King will die on your watch. You can't save our loot. How could you save the town? I am the strongest! No-one else! The Fume Knight could never match me. Nobody can! I am immovable... unless proper rewards are given. ... I've been praying in a dark hall for decades. The Dark Queen has won... ... I failed two kingdoms. I can't cast miracles with this mace!? ARGH! If I can't cast with it, why do I fight with a magical bell!? Hexes! Hexes! Hexes! I... must build my strength. I lack the faith! I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. My strength compels me to lead. Hit me harder than Raime. I don't need hexes for this simple foe! Why do hexes require intellect!? Nobody can lift this mace but me. Right!? Where in Drangleic can I find a better helmet? Excuse me, my failure to defend the King exempts me from service. Why did I leave my King's side? Dark? Light? Hard to say where I fall in that spectrum. Let me fall in service to my King. The Dark Queen won... It's my time. I will rest in the crypt of my King's corpse. Gods, grant me your stories of reprieve. Homeward Miracle? Didn't work... The glory is mine! It's my duty! I can't recall YOUR service in the Giant Wars. I am too important for this. I will leave if these failures continue. Forget it. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I must escape! No, she'll kill us! The Queen will know! It's a bad idea. Not for me! Just kill the phantoms. Hmph. Only orders from my King. Forget me. Escape and live. It's not worth the effort. The throne is empty. ... it can't work. Forgot how, woops! Not enough adaptibility. Don't know what that is. What we're doing isn't working! They know our tactics! Use anything! EVERYTHING! Take a break. I got this. No worries-- I'll do something new. GET THEM! You're all inferior. Thank goodness you never served our king! He'd have died faster! I'd rather fight solo. I must preserve myself. I have my reasons. The Dark compels me. I... can't. No, it won't help us defeat Her. I'm not worthy to guard the King. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! Can't think of it! ... it's quiet like the crypt. Our Queen emerged from darkness like this. ... will our King be avenged? Outnumbered by phantoms! What are our odds? Let's visit Ornifex for some new weapons. Keep that fire high! Shadows betray their motives... This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love a good fight! By Vendrick, I shouldn't be with such low-lives. None of you should leave the bonfire. Replace me with a soapstone summon. This isn't worth my time. Hey, you save some extra food for me? Where's second servings? I need more food! We need an end... is this one so bad? The Queen's victory was inevitable. We ought to return to the Hamlet. If only I could remember miracles! Sleep, and never wake. Shhh. The Dark comforts all. Right here! Break yourself upon my body. Royal Aegis? Guess it's time to defend. I'm ready for death. Hit me, not Vendrick! How do I dodge!? Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! We're losing because of you! Leave. You're dead weight. I thought you were a hollow! You were obscured! Let's not discuss that parry. Break yourselves upon my body! Bury me next to the King, or no-where at all. I'll bait them with my worthlessness. I'm used to it! GWAH! We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. No miracle will remember my name if we falter here. A dead king? A dead hand. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? We'll win! Trust me! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. They're too strong! Maybe we can regroup? It's a trap! They're baiting us! Get them off! Need healing! Bring it. Yes, attack me! Where's the priest? Where's my shield!? This is too much! I... tremble!? I had to remain defensive! I can't focus! Woops. I gave it a fair chance. They have high adaptibility! Damnable dodge. We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic. Hardly noticed. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. Good strike... for a snake. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! VENDRICK, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! You damnable clutz! At least land a hit! I'd have more luck bare-handed. You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Ah, you're not trained much, are you? Clearly he dodged it. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you could serve a hollow! Guaranteed hit? Bit cheap. Ah, a hit. About time. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're agents of the Queen! A bad gamble. Clearly he had seen that move before. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. You don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. You belong below Majula. I demand a Bonfire Ascetic. I demand a Bonfire Ascetic. No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's a potion? The Queen may have corrupted it! No-- it's a trap! I must not! Fool. When I need to. Why are you such a weakling? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! Honor compels me to die in service. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to Shulva. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. Are you an agent of the Queen? Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was so weak! I must say I am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... My King... We shouldn't rest here. This place is cursed. There are so many more. Trolls would strike! I know they're coming. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're all green. It shows.
